PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SwitchingDeviceTypeEmergencyStop
PropertySetDef.Definition: An emergency stop device acts to remove as quickly as possible any danger that may have arisen unexpectedly.

PropertyDef.Name: SwitchOperation
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates operation of emergency stop switch.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfPhases
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of phases that the equipment operates on.

PropertyDef.Name: BreakingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: The current that a fuse, circuit breaker, or other electrical apparatus is able to interrupt without being destroyed or causing an electric arc with unacceptable duration.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfEarthFaultRelays
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the number of relays used for preventing earth fault.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfEmergencyButtons
PropertyDef.Definition: The number of emergency buttons built in the device.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfRelays
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates number of relays built in the device.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfOverCurrentRelays
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates number of relays used for preventing over current.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfAffectedPoles
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of poles that the equipment affects.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalCurrent
PropertyDef.Definition: A set of nominal currents in [A] for which the data of this instance is valid. At least one value shall be provided. Any value in the set shall not exceed the value of the UltimateRatedCurrent associated with the same breaker unit.

PropertyDef.Name: RatedFrequency
PropertyDef.Definition: Frequency of the AC electric power supply when the device or system reaches its optimum operating condition.

PropertyDef.Name: RatedVoltage
PropertyDef.Definition: The range of allowed voltage that a device is certified to handle. The upper bound of this value is the maximum.

PropertyDef.Name: TransformationRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: The ratio of the actual primary current or voltage to the actual secondary current or voltage.
